item.title: Some agencies tell employees to hold off responding to latest Musk email
item.description: Multiple federal agencies appeared to be caught off guard by the Elon Musk-directed email from the Office of Personnel Management.

item.title: Pope's condition remains critical after 'asthmatic respiratory crisis': Vatican
item.description: Asthmatic respiratory crisis indicates the pope struggled to maintain a sufficient oxygen level when breathing on his own, according to medical expert...

item.title: Trump administration fires workers at NIH Alzheimer's research center
item.description: The center's incoming director was among those terminated.

item.title: 'See you in court': Trump clashes with Democratic governor at White House event
item.description: At a White House event with a bipartisan group of governors Friday, President Donald Trump briefly sparred with Democratic Maine Gov. Janet Mills.
